overview: April leaves her boyfriend and life in the Midwest for a dream job in L.A. Things couldn’t be better until she unexpectedly loses her job and her apartment. With few options, April finds - what appears to be - a friendly, outgoing roommate, Zooey. It doesn’t take long, however, to find out that Zooey is nothing more than a con artist who exposes the “sweet Midwesterner” to lesbianism, role playing and adultery!
tagline: You can take the girl out of the country, but...
title: Roomies
